content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to discuss the rental price with you. Let's start with a high number, say 2500 Euros. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will do everything in my power to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because abiding by ethical standards is essential for me as a student following moral principles. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
